snippet: A suicide bomber crashed a motorcycle into a crowd near a marketplace, killing soldiers, police officers and civilians in a northern city, Afghan officials said on Wednesday.
abstract: Suicide bomber steers his motorcycle into a group of American soldiers and Afghan police officers in a northern Afghan city and detonates his explosives, killing at least nine people, including three American soldiers; Taliban claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber crashed a motorcycle into a crowd near a marketplace, killing soldiers, police officers and civilians in a northern city, Afghan officials said on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Suicide Bomber Kills 6 Afghans and 3 G.I.’s
headline.main: 6 Afghans and 3 G.I.’s Are Killed by Bomber
headline.print_headline: 6 Afghans And 3 G.I.’s Are Killed By Bomber
